items.question: What video quality can I expect for avatar videos?
items.answer: Our system delivers high-quality avatar videos with clear visuals and smooth animations. The standard model produces clear outputs suitable for online use, while the enhanced model offers superior realism with impressive detail.

items.question: Can I customize my avatar’s movements?
items.answer: Absolutely! You can define the actions and movements through simple text prompts, allowing your avatar to express various actions such as gestures or specific behaviors.

items.question: What formats are best for avatar uploads?
items.answer: High-resolution PNGs or SVGs are recommended for best results. Make sure your avatars are well-designed, with transparent backgrounds for seamless integration into videos.

items.question: How does this differ from traditional animated videos?
items.answer: Unlike traditional animations that require extensive design work, our AI-driven approach allows for quick creation of engaging avatar videos with customizable motions, making it more accessible for all users.

items.question: Can I enhance video quality after creation?
items.answer: Yes! You can use our upscaling tools to improve your avatars’ video resolution and overall clarity, ensuring they look sharp and professional.

items.question: What pricing model is used for avatar video generation?
items.answer: We offer a flexible pay-as-you-go model with clear pricing based on the animation style and duration selected. This allows you to create without monthly commitments.

items.question: How long does it take to create an avatar video?
items.answer: Video generation is typically quick—most avatar videos are created in just 1-2 minutes, enabling rapid content production without delays.

items.question: What are the best use cases for avatar videos?
items.answer: Avatar videos work perfectly for online branding, personalized advertising, social media engagement, training videos, and any realm where dynamic visual content is essential.

items.question: Do I own the rights to the generated avatar videos?
items.answer: Yes! All videos created through WaveSpeed include full commercial rights, so you can utilize them across various platforms without additional fees or restrictions.

items.question: What support resources are available if I encounter issues?
items.answer: We provide comprehensive support documentation, tutorials, and responsive customer service to help with any questions or technical difficulties you may face.
